If I didn't already own a 12-469 and hadn't just bought this cute little 12=
-470 (which arrived today in perfect condition, by the way), I would most d=
efinitely be going after your Dynamic Duo system.  What a great deal!  

Ro=
bin


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: M.A. Coletta (Mike)<mailto:mi=
chaelcoletta@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com> 
  Sent: Thursday, January 17, 2008 7:31 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC=
] 12-470 & 12-469 system on ebay


  Anyone want to reseacher with that Dyn=
amic Duo Ghost Box System I put 
  together a couple weeks ago? I've got it=
 on ebay for just about what I 
  paid to put it together. $80
  http://cgi=
.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3D170186788084<http://cgi.ebay.com=
/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3D170186788084>

  It's got a hacked 12-470=
, a hacked 12-469, an audio mixer, the wall-
  wart power plug for the mixe=
r, a microphone, and the cables to connect 
  it all.
  You'll just have to=
 add your own speakers or recorder and plug those 
  into the mixer output =
cable.

  - Mike
